name: BLINK BALL HOP - KPOP TILES
description:
WE ARE BLINK AND WE LOVE KPOP

Are you ready for a thrilling ride?
Most exciting running - hopping - sliding Ball Game!
The running ball starts simply and ramps up shortly.

*** HOT UPDATE ***
- BLINK Ball Hop! is a game that challenges your reflexes and reaction time.
- Play now and feel new BLINK music challenges wherever you are.
- BLINK Ball Hop!, You can play games with lots of attractive KPOP music.
- BLINK Ball Hop! will be the best music game for you!

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
- Hold & drag the ball
- Follow the rhythm
- Hop on the music tiles
- And, don't miss the tiles!
Your only challenge is to keep the ball jumping on the music tiles road while listening to the beat drops.

*** GAME FEATURES ***
- Control with 1 touch, easy to control.
- Extreme 3D graphics and effects.
- 45+ good KPOP songs to play and relax for BLINK.
- 20+ wallpapers and effects bring fun experience every time you play.
- Collect the personality Ball Costume.

BLINK Ball Hop! will create an extremely interesting experience for anyone who loves KPOP music.
Enjoy the addictive music and challenges designed for each road.
Let's play and train your Eyes Coordination!

All free! Play BLINK Ball Hop! today!
